summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of SkillGap AI application completed. Backend APIs fully functional with proper skill extraction (25+ skills), TF-IDF algorithm working correctly with varied match percentages (27-54%), and Claude Sonnet 4.5 AI integration operational. Frontend has beautiful dark design with working authentication, dashboard, and upload interface.

flaky_endpoints.issue: PyPDF2 parsing fails with malformed PDF files
flaky_endpoints.impact: Upload fails with 500 error for invalid PDF format
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Use DOCX files or properly formatted PDFs

ui_bugs.issue: User sessions expire quickly causing frequent logouts

integration_issues.issue: Only PDF/DOCX supported but error messaging could be clearer for unsupported formats

passed_tests: API health check and all endpoints responding
Resume upload with comprehensive skill extraction (25+ skills)
Skill matching algorithm with TF-IDF + cosine similarity (varied results: 27-54%)
AI learning roadmap generation using Claude Sonnet 4.5
Career test with 20 questions and AI analysis
Homepage and dashboard UI with modern dark design
Navigation between pages and proper routing
File upload interface for PDF/DOCX files

action_item_for_main_agent.session_management: Implement longer session timeouts or refresh token mechanism to prevent frequent logouts
action_item_for_main_agent.file_upload_validation: Add clearer error messages for unsupported file formats during upload
action_item_for_main_agent.pdf_parsing: Improve PDF parsing error handling or add file format validation before processing
